question.questiontext:
Completa la tabla de función de transición para el AFD que se obtendría de aplicar el método de construcción de subconjuntos al AFND de la figura

$$\mathcal{Q}/\Sigma$$ a b c
A {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%B~A~C~E} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%C~A~D~F} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%D~E~F~A} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%0, 1, 2, 4, 5, 7, 8, 9, 11, 13~0, 1, 2, 4, 5, 7, 9, 11, 13~0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 8, 9, 11, 13~0, 1, 2, 4, 7, 8, 9, 11, 13}
B {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%E~D~C~A} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%F~E~D~A} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%D~E~B~A} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%3, 8, 9, 10, 11~3, 8, 9, 10, 13~3, 7, 9, 10, 11~1, 3, 8, 9, 10}
C {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%E~D~F~A} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%C~A~D~F} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%D~B~E~A} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 11~5, 6, 7, 9, 11~5, 6, 7, 9, 10, 11~4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 11}
D {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%B~D~A~E} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%C~A~B~F} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%D~B~E~A} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%1, 2, 4, 5, 7, 8, 9, 11, 12, 13~1, 2, 3, 5, 7, 8, 9, 11, 12, 13~1, 2, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 11, 12~0, 1, 2, 4, 5, 7, 9, 11, 12, 13}
E {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%E~D~C~A} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%F~D~E~B} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%D~F~E~A} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%9, 10, 11~2, 10, 11~0, 10, 11~7, 10, 11}
F {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%F~D~E~C} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%F~E~D~C} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%F~D~E~B} {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%Cjto. vacío~12~2~7}





















Los estados finales son: {1:MULTICHOICE:%100%A, D~D, F~B, D~A, B}
